abstract: The Fed is having to shift substantially from the approach that has defined it and from which it has long derived its institutional self-esteem.
snippet: The Fed is having to shift substantially from the approach that has defined it and from which it has long derived its institutional self-esteem.
lead_paragraph: BOSTON  A situation the Federal Reserve has long feared has come to pass: the central bank, after spending three decades taming inflation, now needs more of it.

headline.main: A New Quandary for the Federal Reserve: Grappling With Low Inflation
headline.print_headline: A New Quandary for the Federal Reserve: Grappling With Low Inflation
